name: NutVan
description:
Collect all them Nutzz!

NNN is over but don't let that stop you from getting more nuts!

Avoid obstacles as you charge towards the exit to safely collect the nuts. Be quick as the time is limited for you.

This is a fan made game and not an official product of Cover Corp. This game or developer is not endorsed by or directly affiliated with Cover Corp or Hololive.
